T02D3364:41a-1: ae ka dz'a t'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3364:41a-3: ral gcig ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3364:41a-4: 'phags ma ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3364:41a-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D3364:41a-6: pa'i rjes su sna tshogs padma'i steng du t'am yongs
T02D3364:41b-1: thod pa'i dbus su h'um sngon po spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D3364:41b-2: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma ral gcig ma yan lag thams cad gnag pa /
T02D3364:41b-6: spyan gsum pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D3364:41b-7: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
T02D3364:41b-8: skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng ba /
T02D3364:41b-9: mche ba gtsigs shing ljags 'dril ba /
T02D3364:41b-11: sngon po'i sbrul gyis sna tshogs brgyan pa'o //
T02D3364:41b-13: 'o ma 'dzin pa'i nu ma rgyas shing mtho bar langs pa /
T02D3364:41b-14: do shal dang dbu rgyan dang /
T02D3364:41b-16: me tog gi phreng bas ma lus pa'i yan lag la tshom bu byas pa'o //
T02D3364:41b-17: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis na ral gri dang gri gug bsnams pa /
T02D3364:41b-18: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis na autpa la dang thod pa
T02D3364:41b-19: bsnams pa'i bdag nyid du skad cig gis bskyed la
T02D3364:41b-21: aom hr'i:tr'am h'um phat zhes bya'o //
T02D3364:41b-22: ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3364:41b-23: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
